user.title: Choose something to control
user.description:
Choose a fan or light to control.

If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/lymanepp/ha-light-controller

fan.title: Configure fan operating mode
fan.description:
Configure the fan operating mode.

If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/lymanepp/ha-light-controller

ceiling_fan.title: Configure ceiling fan controller
ceiling_fan.description:
Automate a ceiling fan for comfort using the summer simmer index (SSI) as the comfort level. http://www.summersimmer.com/home.htm

If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/lymanepp/ha-light-controller

data.ssi_min: Fan will start when SSI above
data.ssi_max: Fan speed will be maximum when SSI above

exhaust_fan.title: Configure exhaust fan controller
exhaust_fan.description: Configure the exhaust fan controller. If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/lymanepp/ha-light-controller

light.title: Configure light options
light.description:
Turn on a light based on motion detection, and light level. Turn off a light when there isn't motion. Everything is optional.

If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/lymanepp/ha-light-controller

error.manual_control_no_motion: Manual control requires a motion sensor.

abort.nothing_to_control: No entities are available to control
abort.already_configured: An integration with the same fan already exists.
